Field.Description: Valid values are 0-3, bit resolution
Field.Name: PPH_RESERVED_BITS_SIZE

Field.Description: Valid values are 16-23, bit resolution
Field.Name: PPH_OUT_LIF_SIZE

Field.Description: Valid values are 16-22, bit resolution
Field.Name: PPH_IN_LIF_SIZE

Field.Description: Valid values are 4-8, bit resolution
Field.Name: PPH_IN_LIF_PROFILE_SIZE

Field.Description: Valid values are 1-3, bit resolution
Field.Name: PPH_FWD_LAYER_IDX_SIZE

Field.Description: Valid values are 0-4, bit resolution
Field.Name: PPH_FWD_LAYER_ADDITIONAL_INFO_SIZE

Field.Description: Valid values are 16-18, bit resolution
Field.Name: PPH_FWD_DOMAIN_SIZE

Field.Description: Valid values are 0-3, bit resolution
Field.Name: PPH_END_OF_PACKET_EDITING_SIZE

Field.Description: FTMH destination extension present
Field.Name: FTMH_TM_DESTINATION_EXT_PRESENT

Field.Description: Start bit on learn_payload for address to ElephantTrapCfg and SlbCfg tables
Field.Name: SLB_LEARN_PAYLOAD_START_BIT

Field.Description: Start bit on learn_payload for address to ElephantTrapCfg and SlbCfg tables
Field.Name: ELEPHANT_TRAP_LEARN_PAYLOAD_START_BIT

Field.Description: Max value of Out-RIFs
Field.Name: OUT_RIF_SIZE

Field.Description: UDH BASE present
Field.Name: JR_MODE_ADD_UDH_BASE

Field.Description: Compensate UDH size in sytem header
Field.Name: JR_MODE_UDH_SIZE_COMPENSATION_ENABLE

Field.Description: enable fhei with inlif_profile
Field.Name: ENABLE_FHEI_WITH_IN_LIF_PROFILE

AppDB.Name: INGRESS_LBP_VLAN_EDITING
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Ingress LBP VLAN Editing Configurations Table

Field.Description: Select whether to process native (inner) ETH at VTE or VTD
Field.Name: NATIVE_ETH_STAGE_VTE

Field.Description: Force getting the IVEC command from the lif entry
Field.Name: FORCE_VEC_FROM_LIF

Field.Description: Enable accessing IVEC from VTE stage
Field.Name: VTE_IVEC_ACCESS_ENABLE

Field.Description: Select whether to process second vsi lookup at stage VTD or VTE
Field.Name: SECOND_VSI_LOOKUP_SEL

Field.Description: Select SEXEM access for interface 0 between vtt stage 1 to vird My-Mac (0 means vtt)
Field.Name: SEXEM_INTERFACE_0_SEL

Field.Description: Select SEXEM aceess for interface 1 between vtt stage 2 to vird My-Mac (0 means vtt)
Field.Name: SEXEM_INTERFACE_1_SEL

Field.Description: Select SEXEM aceess for interface 2 between vtt stage 2 to vird My-Mac (0 means vtt)
Field.Name: SEXEM_INTERFACE_2_SEL

Field.Description: VCP mode for LLVP in VTT parse1 and parser2
Field.Name: EXTEND_VCP_EN

Field.Description: Mask FODO, property of the LIF
Field.Name: FODO_BASE_MASK

Field.Description: Mask the result of SEM lookup
Field.Name: PD_RESULT_MASK

Field.Description: Indicates for each Forwarding_layer_type if is ethernet
Field.Name: PROTOCOL_ETH_ENABLE

Field.Description: Indicates for each Forwarding_layer_type if it is ARP
Field.Name: PROTOCOL_ARP_ENABLE

Field.Description: Indicates for each protocol_type ON fwd_layer_idx-1 if is ethernet
Field.Name: PROTOCOL_ETH_MINUS_ONE_ENABLE

Field.Description: Indicates for each Forwarding_layer_type if is ip
Field.Name: PROTOCOL_IP_ENABLE

Field.Description: Indicates for each Forwarding_layer_type if is ipv4
Field.Name: PROTOCOL_IPV4_ENABLE

Field.Description: Indicates for each Forwarding_layer_type if is ipv6
Field.Name: PROTOCOL_IPV6_ENABLE

Field.Description: Indicates for each Forwarding_layer_type if is mim
Field.Name: PROTOCOL_MIM_ENABLE

Field.Description: Indicates for each Forwarding_layer_type if is mpls at VT stage
Field.Name: PROTOCOL_MPLS_TERM_ENABLE

Field.Description: Indicates for each Forwarding_layer_type if is mpls at FWD stage
Field.Name: PROTOCOL_MPLS_FWD_ENABLE

Field.Description: Indicates for each Forwarding_layer_type if is udp
Field.Name: PROTOCOL_UDP_ENABLE

Field.Description: Indicates for each Forwarding_layer_type if is BFD single hop
Field.Name: PROTOCOL_BFD_SINGLE_HOP_ENABLE

Field.Description: Indicates for each Forwarding_layer_type if is BFD multi hop
Field.Name: PROTOCOL_BFD_MULTI_HOP_ENABLE

Field.Description: Indicates for each Forwarding_layer_type if is ICMPV6
Field.Name: PROTOCOL_ICMPV6_ENABLE

Field.Description: Indicates for each Forwarding_layer_type if is IGPM
Field.Name: PROTOCOL_IGMP_ENABLE

Field.Description: Indicates for each Forwarding_layer_type if is 8021_X_2
Field.Name: PROTOCOL_8021_X_2_ENABLE

Field.Description: Indicates for each Forwarding_layer_type if is ICMP
Field.Name: PROTOCOL_ICMP_ENABLE

Field.Description: Enable BIER processing in IPMF1
Field.Name: PROTOCOL_BIER_MPLS_ENABLE

AppDB.Name: INGRESS_MAP_PARSING_CTX_LAYER_PROTOCOL
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Ingress map parsing context to layer protocol

Field.Description: Layer types mapping before speculative parse validation.
Field.Name: LAYER_TYPES_BEFORE

Field.Description: Layer types mapping after speculative parse validation.
Field.Name: LAYER_TYPES_AFTER

Field.Description: If set, IHP data path is enabled. Otherwise IHP data path is disabled and packets are not accepted.
Field.Name: DATA_PATH_ENABLE

Field.Description: PTC profile[0:1] VTT1 toward VTT2
Field.Name: PTC_PROFILE_VTT2

Field.Description: PTC profile[2:3] VTT1 toward VTT2
Field.Name: PTC_ROUTING_ENABLE_PROFILE_VTT1

Field.Description: If CUD is equal to cud-invalid-value, vaule then cud is invalid
Field.Name: PD_CUD_INVALID_VALUE

Field.Description: If set, Networks header termination is enabled
Field.Name: ENABLE_TERMINATION

AppDB.Name: INGRESS_FORWARDING_ADDITIONAL_INFO
AppDB.OneLineDescription: The table maps FAI to unknown address(BUM traffic)

Field.Description: Enable/disable BUM Traffic
Field.Name: BUM_TRAFFIC_ENABLE

AppDB.Name: ITPP_TERMINATE_NETWORK_HEADERS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: The table enables netwrok headers terminarion

Field.Description: Enable/disable network headers termination
Field.Name: ITPP_TERMINATE_NETWORK_HEADERS

Field.Description: Enable Same interface Filter per context
Field.Name: SAME_INTERFACE

Field.Description: Same interface Filter Profile per context
Field.Name: FWD_CONTEXT_SAME_INTERFACE_FILTER

Field.Description: Enable UC_LOOSE_RPF Filter per context
Field.Name: UC_LOOSE_RPF

Field.Description: Enable UC_STRICT_RPF per context
Field.Name: UC_STRICT_RPF

Field.Description: Enable MC_EXPLICIT_RPF per context
Field.Name: MC_EXPLICIT_RPF

Field.Description: Enable MC_EXPLICIT_RPF_ECMP per context
Field.Name: MC_EXPLICIT_RPF_ECMP

Field.Description: Enable MC_SIP_BASED_RPF per context
Field.Name: MC_SIP_BASED_RPF

Field.Description: Enable FACILITY_INVALID per context
Field.Name: FACILITY_INVALID

AppDB.Name: L3_PROTOCOL_L4_VALUES
AppDB.OneLineDescription: The table sets the TCP and UDP protocl fields in the device

Field.Description: TCP protocol value for IPv4 header
Field.Name: IPV_TCP_PROTOCL

Field.Description: UDP protocol value for IPv4 header
Field.Name: IPV_UDP_PROTOCL

AppDB.Name: INGRESS_DA_TYPE_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: The table sets the DA TYpe AMp, used in unknown DA procedure

AppDB.Name: ECOL_IDENTIFICATION_CAM
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Context selection table for ECOlogic. The hit line (priority) is used as Context id for ECOL_CONTEXT_ATTRIBUTES table.

Field.Description: for a 32b field opcode(2),index(3),field offset(11),field size(5),key offset(5) Variable_0(32)
Field.Name: ECOL_FFC_INSTRUCTION_0

Field.Description: for 16b field opcode(2),index(3),field offset(11),field size(4),key offset(4) Variable_1(16)
Field.Name: ECOL_FFC_INSTRUCTION_1

Field.Description: for 16b field opcode(2),index(3),field offset(11),field size(4),key offset(4) Variable_2(16)
Field.Name: ECOL_FFC_INSTRUCTION_2

Field.Description: offset of parsing layer or parsing layer minus one for BTC (Bytes to concatenate)
Field.Name: ECOL_BTC_OFFSET_BASE_IDX

Field.Description: number of bit to add to offset base for BTC (Bytes to concatenate)
Field.Name: ECOL_BTC_OFFSET_SHIFT_IN_BYTES

Field.Description: Only 0x0 mode is supported: get the header size from header size cam table
Field.Name: ECOL_HEADER_SIZE_MODE

Field.Description: key for ECOL_HEADER_SIZE_CAM table. Currently, in CAM table, result is ECOL_HEADER_SIZE_CAM. Currently ECOL_CONTEXT_ATTRIBUTES.ECOL_HEADER_SIZE_INDEX = ECOL_HEADER_SIZE_CAM.ECOL_HEADER_SIZE_INDEX
Field.Name: ECOL_HEADER_SIZE_INDEX

Field.Description: Use context attribute or ffc instruction result var1 as operand B
Field.Name: ECOL_NOF_HEADERS_OP_B_SRC

Field.Description: to use as operand B, according to ECOL_NOF_HEADERS_OP_B_SRC
Field.Name: ECOL_NOF_HEADERS_OP_B_CFG

Field.Description: modes for operandA operator operand B
Field.Name: ECOL_NOF_HEADERS_CALCULATION_MODE

Field.Description: multiply or shift ECOL_NOF_HEADERS by ECOL_HEADER_SIZE
Field.Name: ECOL_BTC_OFFSET_ADD_MODE

Field.Description: offset of parsing layer or parsing layer minus one for BTK (Bytes to keep)
Field.Name: ECOL_BTK_OFFSET_BASE_IDX

Field.Description: number of bit to add to offset base for BTK (Bytes to keep)
Field.Name: ECOL_BTK_OFFSET_SHIFT_IN_BYTES

AppDB.Name: ECOL_HEADER_SIZE_CAM
AppDB.OneLineDescription: The hit line (priority) is used as header size index in ECOL_HEADER_SIZE table

Field.Description: Result from FFC 0.
Field.Name: VARIABLE_0

Field.Description: Header size index from context attributes
Field.Name: ECOL_HEADER_SIZE_INDEX

AppDB.Name: ECOL_HEADER_SIZE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: shift or multiplier for ECO offsets calculation in ECOlogic
